validityText:
There is no input provided to evaluate against the given specification. The specification requires a text description that can contain any combination of characters, is related to the subject, timing, lighting, background, and feeling of the desired photo, does not exceed 80 words, and is written in English.

ERR
coverageText: A serene woman and child are surrounded by warm sunset light on a calm beach with soft sand and gentle waves, evoking a sense of peaceful happiness.
coverageEvalText:
The given chatbot output is a single paragraph that describes the subjects (a serene woman and child), their characteristics, and the environment (warm sunset light, calm beach, soft sand, gentle waves) within an 80-word limit. It also conveys a feeling of peaceful happiness. This complies with the provided description as it focuses on subjects, timing and lighting, background, and the feeling the image should evoke, all within a single paragraph.

OK
